tag_professor: Respected (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: RESPECTED  TOUGH GRADER  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: He is really hard grader. Makes you to study hard and understand the details of the topic. Do not give straight forward answer of your question. Sometimes expects a lot from you. You have to study everyday if you are taking class with him to get good grade.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: RESPECTED  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  AMAZING LECTURES
comments: He is one of the best professors that I have encountered with the MME program. He is not an easy professor to get a good grade on your tests, but if you are willing to put in the amount of time that he puts into the class you will do fine and be a master at the subject. Given the opportunity I would love if he tough all the classes.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)

comments: I was very happy with his teaching style. It was a very difficult class, but in the end I learned a lot more than if he had made it easy.

comments: Does not know how to teach in a way that students can learn. Homework and test are based on the most difficult problems, which makes it difficult to understand the basics. DO NOT TAKE A COURSE WITH THIS GUY.
